bill.summary:
Improving Rural Access to Power Act of 2018
This bill amends the Federal Home Loan Bank Act to authorize Federal Home Loan Banks to purchase certain securities from cooperatives that: (1) have certain investment experience involving the Rural Utilities Service, and (2) have received financing from the Federal Financing Bank.
